_source.text: 1.JOINTS/BLUNTS: The bathroom maybe the easiest place to not get caught smoking but it is the most suspicious, I find the best way of smoking in the bathroom is to tell whoever you are trying to hide the smoke from that you are having a shower, this should clear up suspicions in the long run, it's better than them coming up and saying "XXXXXXXX what are you doing in the bathroom" and smelling the smoke.
